resources.string: You should do the following when confronted with a misbehaving child:
You should be authorative with a misbehaving child.
Punishments to a misbehaving child should always be more severe than their action.
You should always be calm when administering punishment to a misbehaving child.
It is OK to hit a child....
You should do the following when confronted with an intoxicated person:
If confronted with a dangerous intoxicated person stay away from heavy populated areas.
Always try to forcefully take away an intoxicated persons car keys.
If in doubt call the police.
You should always try to help the person even in a dangerous situation.
